videos.description: 1H (14:28) XAV Trevon Bluiett made Three Point Jumper.
videos.headline: Trevon Bluiett dekes out a defender than connects on a three point jumper

videos.description: 1H (12:39) BAY Terry Maston made Layup. Assisted by Jake Lindsey.
videos.headline: Good Baylor ball movement leads to a bucket plus the foul for Terry Maston

videos.description: Baylor forces the steal and Al Freeman is the one rewarded with a transition slam during the first half of Baylor's 76-61 victory over Xavier.
videos.headline: Baylor's good defense leads to Freeman's dunk
Ishmail Wainright with a nice block to save a Xavier lay-up in transition

videos.description: Two Baylor players fight each other for a rebound and miss a wide open lay-up as a result.
videos.headline: Two Baylor players fight each other for a rebound and miss a wide open lay-up as a result

videos.description: 2H (5:30) BAY Jo Lual-Acuil Jr. made Layup. Assisted by Ishmail Wainright.
videos.headline: Great inbounds play from Baylor followed by a Jonathan Motley three pointer extends Baylor's lead over Xavier
